36#include "krb5_locl.h"
37#include <krb5/getarg.h>
38#include <err.h>
39
40KRB5_LIB_FUNCTION void KRB5_LIB_CALL
41krb5_std_usage(int code, struct getargs *args, int num_args)
42{
43 arg_printusage(args, num_args, NULL, "");
44 exit(code);
45}
46
47KRB5_LIB_FUNCTION int KRB5_LIB_CALL
48krb5_program_setup(krb5_context *context, int argc, char **argv,
49 struct getargs *args, int num_args,
50 void (KRB5_LIB_CALL *usage)(int, struct getargs*, int))
51{
52 krb5_error_code ret;
53 int optidx = 0;
54
55 if(usage == NULL)
56 usage = krb5_std_usage;
57
58 setprogname(argv[0]);
59 ret = krb5_init_context(context);
60 if (ret)
61 errx (1, "krb5_init_context failed: %d", ret);
62
63 if(getarg(args, num_args, argc, argv, &optidx))
64 (*usage)(1, args, num_args);
65 return optidx;
66}
67
